scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run server:dev" "npm run frontend:dev" --names "SERVER,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta"
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm run server:prod" "npm run frontend:prod" --names "SERVER,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta"
scripts.server:dev: cd server && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run dev
scripts.server:prod: cd server && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run start
scripts.frontend:dev: cd frontend && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run dev
scripts.frontend:prod: cd frontend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run preview
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
